title: before the otherness came
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HnJK9d

by PunkTsuki

Dear Moony,

I wrote you but you haven’t responded.

Words: 530, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Nymphadora Tonks, Teddy Lupin
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Remus Lupin/Nymphadora Tonks
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Everyone Lives/Nobody Dies, but nothing is happy, Pining, Letters, Past Relationship(s), Hurt, Angst, blow job mention, i’m a scorpio and i’m sad what can i say, yeh sirius might be a little pathetic but i love him okay? okay

tags: listen i rlly wasnt going to do this only then lily was tied to a table?? and sirius was in a lab coat
i guess is this a universe now
summary: can you write more of the writer james, ghost lily please?????
question: can you write more of the writer james, ghost lily please?????
answer:
James was holding a handful of table salt and a can of diced tomatoes out over her, ready to pour.

“Are those seedless?” Lily asked, interested and tied to the dining table.

“Quiet. It won’t work if you’re talking” Sirius’ voice was muffled through the hospital face mask he was wearing for no discernible reason.

“It says here everyone has to hold their breath and then breathe on her at once.” Remus read off his phone.

“Oh, fuck this” Lily started to get up. James reached a hand out to her shoulder, which was as cool as metal, but solidish. Solid enough.

“You said one try.”

“I’m not letting you lot breathe on me. I know what you eat.”

“Don’t be a buzzkill, Frankenstein.” Sirius’ had been desperately trying to get the nickname to take off ever since the Daniel Radcliffe movie had been put on Netflix.

“What if we brush our teeth first” James bargained, salt and tomato still in hand. Lily gave him a look, and then he gave her a look, and there was a whole lot of looking going on. She sighed.

“And mouthwash.”

“Pete!” James yelled, “turn off the fans, we’re taking a mouthwash break!”

“God.” Sirius took his mask off and let it hang around his neck, “Am I the only one who is taking this seriously?”  

“It says,” Remus was still reading off his phone, “That we have to breathe on her and chant the whole time. This chant is, like, long. If we have to be breathing on her the whole time we’ll need to be reincarnated.”

“Good thing everything’s already set up then.” Lily pointed out, in reference to the papered windows and the four fans that were facing her, blowing aimlessly. Peter poked his head around the sliding door into the dining room, eyes shut. Even Peter had been given a lab-coat, swiped by Remus from his Uni. Earlier, this had caused a ten minute debate about whether this was an offense bad enough to get someone kicked off a PhD program.

“Did you say turn the fans off?”

“Pete this isn’t an orgy, you can open your eyes.” James said, vaguely irritated, “Turn them off. Go see if there’s mouthwash in the bathroom.”

“Bet there’s less chat at an orgy.” Sirius complained.

“Surely you’d know.” Remus said, still scrolling. “Hey, you can download this page as a PDF.”

“Why?” James itched his nose with the end of a tomato can.

“Download it in case the internet goes down when we bring Evans back” Sirius said.

“If coming back to life means the internet goes down I’ll stay dead.’

“Stop spoiling the fun.” Sirius was reading over Remus’ shoulder, “Hey, says here you can’t come back to life if you’re harbouring any secrets. Spill Evans. Who killed you.”

“God, Sirius I wasn’t fucking murdered-“

“– Girl who looked just like you on this true crime podcast Remus played in the car once.–“

“Don’t act like you weren’t also into that podcast.”

“What was the podcast?” James asked, interested, putting the tomato can on the table.

“Is it cause the murderer was James? Is that why you’re in love with him? Cause he’s your murderer?” Lily successfully looped one leg from the rope and kicked Sirius in the thigh.

“Shut up.”

“It’s called ‘dead men tell all tales’.” Remus told James, distracted, “It’s really good, these two women and one guy. You know the last step on this plan involves buying this websites special five pound lavender oil right?”

Peter rolled open the sliding door “There’s no mouthwash” he announced, eyes shut, with no one listening, “Now what?”

summary: Fun Hogwarts fact:
body:
Fun Hogwarts fact:

Back when wizards used to excrete in the hallways and Vanish it afterwards, they actually transported it to the Forbidden Forest to serve as fertiliser. This is the reason the Forest is so incrediblely dense, it was fuelled by centuries of wizard droppings!

It speaks volumes that you actually believed me for a second.

summary:
Ron: Can I sleep here today?
Hermione: Of course, did something happen with Harry?
Ron: Draco is in there and he and Harry were...
body:
Ron: Can I sleep here today?
Hermione: Of course, did something happen with Harry?
Ron: Draco is in there and he and Harry were being mean and traumatizing

summary: lovegood
title: lovegood
body:
at the sight of him, she dropped her son into the cot behind her and threw her arms wide …
“not harry, not harry, please not harry!”
“stand aside, you silly girl … stand aside, now … ”
“not harry, please no, take me, kill me instead—”
“this is my last warning—”

“they will be here at any moment. i must save luna. i cannot lose luna. you must not leave.”
he spread his arms in front of the staircase, and harry had a sudden vision of his mother doing the same thing in front of his cot.
“don’t make us hurt you,” harry said. “get out of the way, mr lovegood.”

this similarity between lily and xenophilius is striking but not surprising, but the way harry acts the same way as voldemort; threatening but giving him a chance to move out of his path, is interesting and something i’ve never noticed before

blog.name: asterinblackbeek
blog.title: Dreamer
blog.description: Ravenclaw | Book Nerd | Potterhead | Throne of glass | Chaol Westfall | Severus Snape |

summary: Be mine
body:
Be mine

…..REMUS LUPIN….

It is enough. I’m not going to wait any longer for Sirius to confess his love. I know he loves me. I have seen him practicing how to propose me in front of the mirror so many times. Oh! I love to evesdrop at him when he does such things. But he is taking so long that I have decided to do it myself.

Sirius’s bike stops in the middle of the road. The road is covered with woods from both sides. What a horrible place to stop. Especially at night.

We are going to James and lily’s, for Christmas. They are expecting us tomorrow evening but Sirius has dicided to surprise them with an early visit. So, we had to leave at the middle of the night to reach them at morning.

“Start this damn bike.” I say.

“I’m trying,”

Minutes pass.

“You know what? This is useless.” He says, finally giving up. “This thing ain’t gonna start.”

“What do you mean? We are not gonna stay here. Just give it an another try.” I say, getting up from my seat.

“Look, there is a car over there,” he says.

“I know. I saw that already. It’s parked, I guess.” We get down from the bike.

“There must be people around then,” he says and starts walking towards the car.

“Well, I don’t think people in the middle of the road, at the middle of the night are good people.” I say, walking behind him.

“Well, I’m all good. And believe me, you are not that bad,” he says, as we both continue walking.

“No one’s in the car.” He says peeking inside the car.

“I think there is a fire over there.” I say, pointing at the woods.

“ Fire means people. Let’s go greet them.” He says and looks at me. “Oh , Come on now.”

“This is a terrible idea.” I say but follow.

“Look at all those people. I’m sure they’ll help.” He says. I pull him behind a tree as he tries to greet them.

“Well, a bunch of teen girls. How do you think they can help us?” I ask.

“I don’t exactly know. Let’s ask them what they can do.” He says and greets them.

“ Hello, lovely ladies,” he says with a slight bow. Overacting.

“Oh! Hello,” says one of them. They were sitting around a fire and now all of them are on their feets, staring at us, suspiciously. They are six in total. At least no one looks drunk.

“We were on our way and suddenly our bike broke down. Do you think you can help.” I say, hoping they’ll say No and we’ll leave.

“Oh! Well that’s bad. You can stay here till dawn, if you like to.” Says the girl, who had greeted Sirius.

Before I can open my mouth to say anything, Sirius accepts the offer.

“Now, let’s introduce ourselves. I’m Sirius Black. And he’s my friend Remus Lupin.”

“Nice to meet you. I’m Rosy and they’re my friends. Mentha, Molly, Susan, Taryn and Heather.”

I’m sitting on a log. Alone. I forgot their names as soon as she finished but Sirius remembers them. He has seated himself with them around the fire. Talking. Joking. Laughing.

I hear him calling my name but I pretend otherwise.

“Hey, didn’t you hear me. I was calling you.” He says, standing in front of me.

“Well, I didn’t want to ruin your fun,” I say. He sits besides me and I can feel him staring at me.

I’m not looking at him and I won’t.

He clears his throat and says, “I know you didn’t like this but I can’t see why. They’re all nice and Molly has such a good sense of humour.”

“Well, what happened to your plan?” I ask.

“What plan?” How can he forget about his own plan.

“About James and lily. You wanted to surprise them by an early visit. How can you forget. We didn’t leave our beds to spent a night in woods. At least I didn’t.”

He is starting at me. His eyes wide open, so is his mouth. He is shocked to see me so angry.

“Remus, I…..I didn’t knew this will upset you so much. Geez! I’m so sorry, Remus.I didn’t wanted to stop but that damn bike. At least you can’t blame that on me.” He says. He takes my hand in his and continues, “Tell me what you want me to do now. I mean I can’t understand what do you want.”

“Hey Sirius, come here. I’ll show you something,” shouts Molly, I guess. I don’t exactly know who she is.

“A minute please,” he says to them and then looks at me and asks again, “What is it you want.”

Well, I must accept that it was a good decision to stay here, around the fire. So, I don’t know what to say.

‘Why don’t you like to stay here?’ I thought to myself.

“I don’t have any problem if we stay here till dawn. It’s only 3 hours from now.” I say. Then I pause, open my mouth and shuts it again.

I can’t say what I want. He has planed to do it, he even has practiced it. So I won’t say it.

“Well, what is it then?” He asks.

“I just don’t like them.” I say, nodding towards the girls. “I don’t want you to be with them.” I want you to be with me is the unspoken rest.

“Hey Sirius, we going in our tents,” says one of the girl. “That one is for you and your friend. You two have to share. That’s all we can manage.”

“Thank you.” Sirius says to her and they all vanish in their tents.

“Remus,” he says looking into my eyes, “you have more to say, don’t you? Just say it.” He says. The words are so soft on his lips that it takes me my everything to stop myself from kissing them.

“There is….nothing.” I say, my breath so uneven that anyone can tell that I’m lying. And he’s Sirius, he always knows.

“Just say it, Remus,” he says and cups my face in his hands.

Now I can’t resist, so I kiss him. Deep but brief. Oh God! His lips.

“I want you to be with me. I want you to be mine. Now and forever.” I say, finally.

“All yours, Remus Lupin.” He says and kisses me. This time deep and long.

“Well, we have a tent to share,” he says, pulling apart.

This is my first wolfstar fanfic. It’s not perfect but I hope you guys like it.

Thanks to @of-stars-and-moon for helping

“Hey Sirius, we going in our tents,” says one of the girl. “That one is for you and your friend. You two have to share. That’s all we can manage.”

“Thank you.” Sirius says to her and they all vanish in their tents.

“Remus,” he says looking into my eyes, “you have more to say, don’t you? Just say it.” He says. The words are so soft on his lips that it takes me my everything to stop myself from kissing them.

“There is….nothing.” I say, my breath so uneven that anyone can tell that I’m lying. And he’s Sirius, he always knows.

“Just say it, Remus,” he says and cups my face in his hands.

Now I can’t resist, so I kiss him. Deep but brief. Oh God! His lips.

“I want you to be with me. I want you to be mine. Now and forever.” I say, finally.

“All yours, Remus Lupin.” He says and kisses me. This time deep and long.

“Well, we have a tent to share,” he says, pulling apart.

This is my first wolfstar fanfic. It’s not perfect but I hope you guys like it.

Thanks to @of-stars-and-moon for helping

this is the tumblr for my art. 80 % fanart.

tags: we only get to hear about this scene
(and from different sources only getting the truth at the end)
and I wanted to try and draw it
and took details from all three descriptions
on my first rereads of the book I wondered why Sirius was laughing
I think now there was a bit of a breakdown
best friend and his wife dead
another friend turned out to be the traitor
and now he’s either escaped or killed himself in that explosion
… and who’s going to get blamed for this?
everyone outside of the Potters (dead) and Peter (gone) thinks Sirius was the Secret Keeper
any surviving witnesses couldn’t really tell what happened and only heard Peter’s accusations
it had not been a good day for Sirius
summary: “Anyway they cornered Black in the middle of a street full of Muggles an’ Black took out ‘is wand and ‘e blasted ‘alf the street...
caption:
“Anyway they cornered Black in the middle of a street full of Muggles an’ Black took out ‘is wand and ‘e blasted ‘alf the street apart , am ‘a wizard got it, an’ so did a dozen Muggles what got in the way. ‘orrible, eh? An’ you know what Black did then?

Laughed. Jus’ stood there an’ laughed. An when reinforcements from the Ministry of Magic got there, e’ went wiv ‘em quiet as anyfink, still laughing ‘is ‘ead off. ‘Cos ‘e’s mad, inee, Ern? Inee mad?”

 ~ Stanley Shunpike

“Pettigrew died a hero’s death. Eye-witnesses – Muggles, of course, we wiped their memories later – told us how Pettigrew cornered Black. They say he was sobbing. “Lily and James, Sirius! How could you!” And then he went for his wand. Well, of course, Black was quicker. Blew Pettigrew to smithereens …”

 ~ Cornelius Fudge

“When I cornered him, he yelled for the whole street to hear that I’d betrayed Lily and James. Then, before I could curse him, he blew apart the street with the wand behind his back, killed everyone within twenty feet of himself - and sped down into the sewer with the other rats.”

~ Sirius Black

How could you!” And then he went for his wand. Well, of course, Black was quicker. Blew Pettigrew to smithereens …”

summary: contrecoup
title: contrecoup
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TF3hso

by facingthenorthwind (spacegandalf), poppunkpadfoot (StormVandal)

If there was one thing that Muggle hospitals and Wizarding hospitals had in common, Lily noted, it was how slowly time passed in the emergency room.

Written for HPFT’s Great Collab, theme: back from the brink, challenge: internalized oppression

Words: 2481, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of brinkverse

  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Characters: James Potter, Lily Evans Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin
  • Relationships: James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, background Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Community: HPFT
